general_properties.name: M Block
general_properties.description: The M Block is a compact and versatile 3D-printed part designed for educational, scientific, and display purposes. Manufactured from durable PLA material using FFF 3D printing, this lightweight component (50g) features a unique design optimized for both functionality and visual appeal. Suitable for a range of applications, it is an affordable and eco-conscious option with a low carbon footprint of 5g COâ‚‚ per part.
